title: OrderType
description: Represents an Assessments Order for HR Open Standards.

AssessmentAccessType.title: AssessmentAccessType
AssessmentAccessType.description: This is a set of information used to provide the assessment subject access to a test that has been ordered.

id.description: Identifier for an assessment access type.

assessmentCommunication.description: Communication types to communicate with an assessment subject for a test or to schedule an assessment time and place to take the test.

packageId.description: Identifier to associate with the assessment.

comparisonGroupIds.description: Indicates the applicable group for comparing assessment or appraisal results.

assessmentRequesterName.description: The individual that makes the request.

subject.description: The person who will be the subject of the assessment.

assessmentLanguageCodes.description: The language in which the assessment is required.

assessmentResultLanguageCodes.description: The language in which the assessment results are required.

assessmentAccess.description: This is a set of information used to provide the assessment subject access to a test that has been ordered.

testLocationId.description: An identifier for the location of a testing site or test center where a test was taken. If a test center does not have an identifier, then the name will be used as the identifier in the value property.

assessmentAccessURL.description: The URL that the Requestor will re-direct the candidate to in order to complete the assessment.

onCompletionURL.description: Specifies the URL to direct the candidate to after the assessment is complete.

sendAssessmentResultsToURL.description: Specifies the URL to direct the candidate to after the assessment is complete.

invitationByPartyCode.description: Specifies who will send the invitation to the candidate.  Options are the Customer or the Supplier.
